arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name of the job definition.

containerProperties.description:
A valid [container properties](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/batch/latest/APIReference/API_RegisterJobDefinition.html)
provided as a single valid JSON document. This parameter is required if the `type` parameter is `container`.

name.description: Specifies the name of the job definition.

nodeProperties.description:
A valid [node properties](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/batch/latest/APIReference/API_RegisterJobDefinition.html)
provided as a single valid JSON document. This parameter is required if the `type` parameter is `multinode`.

parameters.description: Specifies the parameter substitution placeholders to set in the job definition.

platformCapabilities.description: The platform capabilities required by the job definition. If no value is specified, it defaults to `EC2`. To run the job on Fargate resources, specify `FARGATE`.

propagateTags.description: Specifies whether to propagate the tags from the job definition to the corresponding Amazon ECS task. Default is `false`.

retryStrategy.description:
Specifies the retry strategy to use for failed jobs that are submitted with this job definition.
Maximum number of `retry_strategy` is `1`.  Defined below.

revision.description: The revision of the job definition.

tags.description: Key-value map of resource tags. .If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

timeout.description: Specifies the timeout for jobs so that if a job runs longer, AWS Batch terminates the job. Maximum number of `timeout` is `1`. Defined below.

type.description:
The type of job definition. Must be `container` or `multinode`.

The following arguments are optional:

containerProperties.description:
A valid [container properties](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/batch/latest/APIReference/API_RegisterJobDefinition.html)
provided as a single valid JSON document. This parameter is required if the `type` parameter is `container`.
